summary: REQ-2 and REQ-3 appear implemented by switching Tour Packages and Honeymoon Offers cards to dedicated per-item image paths under /assets/generated/. Home.tsx shows the new home hero image path, but the diff does not show any new static image assets being added under frontend/public/assets/generated, and the cross-page non-reuse checks for REQ-4 cannot be fully verified from the provided truncated diffs.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and add new, distinct travel photography images (no repeats across cards/sections) and place them as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files (Added: 0). While TSX now references many /assets/generated/*.png paths, there is no evidence the required image files were actually added under frontend/public/assets/generated.
evidence: File diff summary header: Added: 0, Modified: 5, Removed: 0

missing_requirements.requirement: Home page About section image must not be the same asset used on About.tsx; Home page Tour Guide section image must not be the same asset used on TourGuide.tsx.
missing_requirements.reason: Home.tsx is truncated and the diffs for About.tsx and TourGuide.tsx are not included, so there is not enough evidence to confirm the Home section images differ from those pages' images.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (summaries mention dedicated images but do not show the actual asset paths used in About.tsx/TourGuide.tsx)
